template.name: All interacting genes in organism1_Orthologues in organism2
template.title: All interacting genes in organism1-->Orthologues in organism2

query.name: All interacting genes in organism1_Orthologues in organism2
query.view: Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.gene1.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.symbol Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.organism.name Interaction.gene2.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show all interactions for a specified organism and the orthologues of the interacting genes in another organism. Optionally constrain the type of interaction to physical (protein-protein) or genetic.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId

template.name: All_genes_in_organism1_Orthologues_in_organism2
template.title: All gene interactions in organism1-->Orthologues in organism2

query.name: All_genes_in_organism1_Orthologues_in_organism2
query.view: Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.gene1.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.symbol Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.organism.name Interaction.gene2.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show all interactions for a specified organism and the orthologues of the interacting genes in another organism. Optionally constrain the type of interaction to physical (protein-protein) or genetic.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Chromosomal location _All genes Transcripts Exons
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes + Transcripts + Exons

query.name: Chromosomal location _All genes Transcripts Exons
query.view: Chromosome.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.start Chromosome.locatedFeatures.end Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.transcripts.gene.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a specified organism and chromosomal location show all genes, transcripts and exons.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Chromosome_All genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: Chromosome_All genes.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: GO term_Interacting gene_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given GO term and that have been shown to interact with a specific gene.

query.name: GO term_Interacting gene_Genes.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given GO term and that have been shown to interact with a specific gene.

query.name: Gene_Chromosomal location
query.view: Gene.name Gene.symbol Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.locations.start Gene.locations.end Gene.locations.strand
query.longDescription: how the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_Chromosomal location.
query.view: Gene.name Gene.symbol Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.locations.start Gene.locations.end Gene.locations.strand
query.longDescription: how the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_GO terms
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene

query.name: Gene_GO terms.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene

query.name: Gene_Orthologues_GO Terms
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.type Gene.organism.name Gene.homologues.gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.id
query.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to orthologues of a specific gene.

query.name: Gene_Orthologues_Sequence
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.sequence.residues Gene.homologues.homologue.sequence.length
query.longDescription: For a given Gene (or List of Genes) returns the orthologues and the sequence of the gene(s)

query.name: Gene_Overlapping QTLs
query.view: Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.type Gene.overlappingFeatures.trait Gene.overlappingFeatures.pValue Gene.overlappingFeatures.name Gene.overlappingFeatures.abbreviation
query.longDescription: Looks for the QTL region for a gene

query.name: Gene_Pathway
query.view: Pathway.proteins.genes.primaryIdentifier Pathway.proteins.genes.secondaryIdentifier Pathway.proteins.genes.symbol Pathway.identifier Pathway.name Pathway.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show the Pathway identifier(s) and name for the selected gene.

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.primaryAccession
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene

query.name: Gene_Transcript_Transcripts from orthologues
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the transcript identifiers for a particular gene and the transcript identifiers of its predicted orthologues.

query.name: Organism_All Interactions
query.view: Interaction.details.name Interaction.details.role1 Interaction.details.role2 Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.experiment.name Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Interaction.details.relationshipType.name Interaction.gene1.symbol Interaction.gene1.organism.name Interaction.gene2.symbol
query.longDescription: Show all interactions for a specified organism. Optionally further constrain your results to show only physical or genetic interactions.

query.name: Organism_Protein
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession
query.longDescription: Show all the proteins from a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:

template.name: Protein Domain_Proteins_Genes coding for these proteins
template.title: Protein Domain --> Proteins + Genes coding for these proteins

query.name: Protein Domain_Proteins_Genes coding for these proteins
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.organism.shortName Protein.proteinDomains.name Protein.proteinDomains.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomains.type
query.longDescription: Show all genes from a particular organism that code for a certain InterPro protein.

query.name: Publication_Interactions
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.name Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactions.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol
query.longDescription: Show all interactions from a specific publication. (Note: You need to enter a pubMed ID).

query.name: REPORT_gene_to_orthologues
query.view: Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol

query.name: TQ_GOTerm_to_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show all genes annotated with a given GO term (and its children terms)

query.name: TQ_gene_to_GOterms
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Search for GO terms that are annotated for a particular gene.

query.name: TQ_gene_to_allInteractors
query.view: Interaction.details.name Interaction.details.role1 Interaction.details.role2 Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.allInteractors.symbol Interaction.details.dataSets.name Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Interaction.details.relationshipType.identifier Interaction.gene1.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.secondaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.symbol
query.longDescription: Show all the Genes that have an interaction with a given Gene

query.name: TQ_gene_to_gene_interaction
query.view: Interaction.details.name Interaction.details.role1 Interaction.details.role2 Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Interaction.details.relationshipType.name

query.name: TQ_gene_to_orthologues
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.status Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name
query.longDescription: Find all Othologues/Homologues/Paralogues for a given Gene

query.name: TQ_gene_to_proteinDomains
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.uniprotAccession Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.crossReferences.identifier Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.crossReferences.source.name
query.longDescription: Show all the Proteins for a given Gene and all domains associated with the Proteins

query.name: TQ_gene_to_publications
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.year
query.longDescription: Show all the publications associated to a given Gene

query.name: TQ_gene_to_subFeatures
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.transcripts.exons.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.exons.length Gene.transcripts.exons.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.exons.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.exons.chromosomeLocation.start
query.longDescription: Show all the Transcripts and Exons for a given Gene

template.name: TQ_lookup_InterproDomains
template.title: InterPro Name --> Protein domains and families

query.name: TQ_lookup_InterproDomains
query.view: ProteinDomain.name ProteinDomain.primaryIdentifier ProteinDomain.type
query.longDescription: Search for protein domains and families by name

template.name: TQ_organism_to_organism_orthologues
template.title: Organism --> GO terms + Orthologues in one specific organism

query.name: TQ_organism_to_organism_orthologues
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the GO terms for all the genes in one organism which have an orthologue in another organism

template.name: TQ_parentGO_to_genes
template.title: GO term (and children of the GO term) --> Genes

query.name: TQ_parentGO_to_genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Find all genes having the given GO term or having the children of the GO term

template.name: TQ_proteinDomains_to_proteins
template.title: Protein Domain Names --> Proteins + Genes encoding the Proteins

query.name: TQ_proteinDomains_to_proteins
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.organism.name Protein.proteinDomains.name Protein.proteinDomains.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomains.type
query.longDescription: Search for specific Genes and Protiens of specific Domain names
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: TQ_protein_to_GOterms
template.title: Protein --> GO Terms of a specific Ontology

query.name: TQ_protein_to_GOterms
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Protein.genes.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Protein.genes.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Show all GO terms associated with a given Protein

query.name: TQ_protein_to_gene
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.end
query.longDescription: Show the Gene corresponding to a given Protein

query.name: TQ_protein_to_publications
query.view: Protein.name Protein.primaryAccession Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.uniprotName Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.pubMedId Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year
query.longDescription: Show all publications associated with a Protein

query.name: cge_gene_to_orthologs_to_pathway
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.source Gene.homologues.gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.shortName Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.curated Gene.homologues.homologue.pathways.name Gene.name
query.longDescription: For all genes in Bos. taurus, get all the orthologues in another organism along with its Pathway information.

template.name: cge_transcript_id_to_gene_and_gene_ontology
template.title: Transcript ID --> Gene ID --> Gene Ontology

query.name: cge_transcript_id_to_gene_and_gene_ontology
query.view: Transcript.primaryIdentifier Transcript.gene.primaryIdentifier Transcript.gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Transcript.gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name
query.longDescription: For a given Transcript ID, returns all Gene and its assigned Gene Ontology.

query.name: cge_transcript_id_to_gene_and_pathway
query.view: Transcript.primaryIdentifier Transcript.gene.primaryIdentifier Transcript.gene.proteins.uniprotAccession Transcript.gene.proteins.uniprotName Transcript.gene.pathways.name Transcript.gene.pathways.identifier Transcript.gene.pathways.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a given Transcript ID, returns its Gene ID and Pathway information.

template.name: deh_chromosome_coordinates_for_all_genes_and_overlapping_SNPs
template.title: Chromosome Coordinates --> All genes and its overlapping SNPs

query.name: deh_chromosome_coordinates_for_all_genes_and_overlapping_SNPs
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start
query.longDescription: Returns all genes and overlapping SNPs provided genomic coordinates.

query.name: deh_expression_by_tissue
query.view: Expression.isoform.primaryIdentifier Expression.sampleMetadata.sraRunAccession Expression.sampleName Expression.sampleMetadata.tissue Expression.FPKM Expression.normalizedCounts Expression.rawCounts
query.longDescription: Returns IDs and Expression Values for Transcripts Expressed in the Provided Tissue. User can also filter by expression values.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

query.name: deh_gene_id_to_transcript_expression
query.view: Expression.isoform.gene.primaryIdentifier Expression.isoform.primaryIdentifier Expression.sampleMetadata.sraSampleAccession Expression.sampleName Expression.sampleMetadata.tissue Expression.sampleMetadata.btoName Expression.FPKM Expression.normalizedCounts Expression.rawCounts
query.longDescription: Provide a Gene ID and View Expression Data. User can filter by tissues and expression values.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: deh_qtl_id_to_transcript_id_and_expression
template.title: QTL ID --> Transcript and its Expression

query.name: deh_qtl_id_to_transcript_id_and_expression
query.view: Transcript.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Transcript.overlappingFeatures.trait Transcript.primaryIdentifier Transcript.source Transcript.expressionValues.FPKM Transcript.expressionValues.normalizedCounts Transcript.expressionValues.rawCounts Transcript.expressionValues.sampleName Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.sraRunAccession Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.tissue
query.longDescription: Returns the Expression Values of Transcripts That Overlap Desired QTL Regions, given a QTL ID. You can further filter by expression values.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and A

template.name: deh_qtl_trait_to_transcript_id_and_expression
template.title: QTL Trait --> Transcript and its Expression

query.name: deh_qtl_trait_to_transcript_id_and_expression
query.view: Transcript.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Transcript.overlappingFeatures.trait Transcript.primaryIdentifier Transcript.expressionValues.normalizedCounts Transcript.expressionValues.FPKM Transcript.expressionValues.rawCounts Transcript.expressionValues.sampleName Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.sraRunAccession Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.tissue Transcript.overlappingFeatures.type
query.longDescription: Returns the Expression Values of Transcripts That Overlap Desired QTL Regions. You can further filter by expression values.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and A

query.name: deh_transcript_id_to_expression
query.view: Expression.isoform.primaryIdentifier Expression.sampleMetadata.sraSampleAccession Expression.sampleName Expression.sampleMetadata.tissue Expression.sampleMetadata.btoName Expression.FPKM Expression.normalizedCounts Expression.rawCounts
query.longDescription: Provide a Transcript ID and View Expression Data. User can filter by tissues and expression values.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and E

template.name: gene_exon_overlapping_snps
template.title: Gene --> Overlapping SNPs in the exon regions

query.name: gene_exon_overlapping_snps
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.source Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.alternateAllele Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.referenceAllele Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start
query.longDescription: Returns all overlapping SNPs in the exon region for a given gene. Users can search via Gene ID or Symbol.

query.name: gene_to_overlapping_snps
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.source Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.referenceAllele Gene.overlappingFeatures.alternateAllele Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end
query.longDescription: Returns all overlapping SNPs for a given gene. Users can search via Gene ID or Symbol.

query.name: qtl_to_overlapping_transcripts
query.view: QTL.primaryIdentifier QTL.trait QTL.type QTL.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier QTL.overlappingFeatures.source QTL.overlappingFeatures.status
query.longDescription: Returns all overlapping Transcripts for a given QTL ID.

query.name: qtl_to_transcripts_filter
query.view: QTL.primaryIdentifier QTL.fStat QTL.lodScore QTL.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier QTL.overlappingFeatures.source QTL.overlappingFeatures.status

query.name: qtl_trait_to_transcript
query.view: Transcript.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Transcript.overlappingFeatures.trait Transcript.primaryIdentifier Transcript.overlappingFeatures.type
query.longDescription: Returns the transcripts that overlap all of the QTLs for a given trait

query.name: report_gene_id_to_overlapping_features
query.view: Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.dataSets.name Gene.overlappingFeatures.sequenceOntologyTerm.name

template.name: snp_rsid_to_chromosome_location
template.title: SNP ID --> Chromosome Location
template.comment: The output of this query can be used as input for Genomic Region Search

query.name: snp_rsid_to_chromosome_location
query.view: SNP.primaryIdentifier SNP.chromosome.primaryIdentifier SNP.chromosomeLocation.start SNP.chromosomeLocation.end
query.longDescription: Get chromosome location for a given SNP rsID.

template.name: transcript_id_to_expression_and_metadata
template.title: Transcript ID --> Expression, Metadata and BRENDA Term

query.name: transcript_id_to_expression_and_metadata
query.view: Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.sampleName Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.experimentName Transcript.expressionValues.sampleMetadata.brendaTissueOntology.name Transcript.expressionValues.FPKM Transcript.expressionValues.normalizedCounts Transcript.expressionValues.rawCounts
query.longDescription: Meant for Transcript report page
